title: Report a Lost or Stolen Credit Card
description: A customer calls in a panic because they have lost their credit card.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quickly and securely verifies the customer's identity.

tasks.description: Immediately deactivate the lost credit card to prevent any transactions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully deactivates the specified card.

tasks.description: Review recent transactions with the customer to identify any potential fraud.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent and customer review the last 5 transactions and confirm they are all legitimate.

tasks.description: Order a replacement card to be sent to the customer's address on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully issues a new card.
